author: Staff Reporter
text:
A decomposed body of woman aged about 25 was found in a sugarcane field near Kilpennathur.

Balaraman, a farmer of Chinna Kangiyanur village was irrigating his sugarcane field past Wednesday midnight. As he felt the stench of dead body he searched through the field and found a decomposed body of woman wearing rose colour chudidhar. Kilpennathur police are investigating to find out who the woman was.

They suspect it to be a murder and the murderer could have thrown the body into the sugarcane field.
title: Decomposed body of woman found
